{"id":1824625223,"question_id":4119,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 week, 2 days","timestamp":1762655850,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1824625223/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Distance Between Three Equal Elements II","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minimumDistance(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int N = (int)nums.size();\n        unordered_map<int, set<int>> m;\n\n        for (int i=0; i<N; i++)\n            m[nums[i]].insert(i);\n\n        int ans = INT_MAX;\n        for (auto [k, v] : m) {\n            if ((int)v.size() < 3) continue;\n            ans = min(ans, 2*(*v.rbegin() - *v.begin()));\n        }\n\n        return (ans == INT_MAX ? -1 : ans);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-distance-between-three-equal-elements-ii","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":1348}
